scripts.prod:nightly: npm run prod:custom -- --yoroiExtensionId=poonlenmfdfbjfeeballhiibknlknepo && npm run prod:compress -- --env 'nightly' --app-id 'yoroi-ergo-connector-nightly' --zip-only --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-ergo-connector-nightly.crx' --key ./keys/nightly-key.pem
scripts.prod:stable: npm run prod:custom -- --yoroiExtensionId=ffnbelfdoeiohenkjibnmadjiehjhajb && npm run prod:compress -- --env '' --app-id 'yoroi-ergo-connector' --zip-only --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-ergo-connector.crx' --key ./keys/production-key.pem
